name: spo-ensure-cts-before-template
title: Ensure all required Content Types are available before Get-PnPSiteTemplate
shortDescription: This is a Content type pre-burner before extracting a PnP Template
longDescription: If one of the Content Types you are using on your master site is part of a Content Type Hierachy, you need to ensure that all the Content Types are available on the site before you use the `Get-PnPSiteTemplate` cmdlet. This will ensure that you can deploy the Template without any issues.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Ensure all required Content Types are available before Get-PnPContentType

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
